dcterms:creator: Marius Cordts
Mohamed Omran
Sebastian Ramos
Timo Rehfeld
Markus Enzweiler
Rodrigo Benenson
Uwe Franke
Stefan Roth
Bernt Schiele
dcterms:description: The CityScapes dataset consists of 2975 training images, 500 validation images, and 1525 test images including their corresponding ground truth labels. The images show German street scenes along with their pixel-level semantic labels of 30 (19) classes, specifically focusing on driveable areas.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI Road dataset consists of 289 images with manually annotated ground truth labels, split into 259 images for training and 30 images for validation. The dataset is used for evaluating the performance of algorithms in the context of autonomous driving.
dcterms:title: KITTI Road Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jakob Mayr
Christian Unger
Federico Tombari
dcterms:description: The Automatic Annotations (TDG) dataset automatically generates annotations for the task of driveable area segmentation, significantly increasing the amount of training data available compared to manual labeling.
dcterms:title: Automatic Annotations (TDG)
